trial_identification.studytitle: Changes in Invitro and ex Vivo Lens Metrology With Daily Wear Contact Lenses
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Changes in Invitro and ex Vivo Lens Metrology With Experienced Daily Wear Contact Lens Wearers

ethicsAndSummary.summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate changes in contact lens geometry after lens wear
